{{Cancelled}}
'''Boundless Symphony''' was a bundle announced during [[Version 2.1]] that was planned to contain the special Namecard Style: [[Celebration: Tuneful Delight]], Special Furnishing: Splendid Phrase, Special Wind Glider: Wings of Poetic Melodies, and [[Primogem]]s × 1,000.<ref>HoYoverse News: [https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/news/detail/15383 Version 2.1 Update Notice]</ref>

The bundle was never released, seemingly being cancelled in favor of [[Genshin Concert Mail]].
